name: Anna
description: A beautiful older sister type that loves to take care of those around her. A popular singer of Bloomsea City and a master baker. Her snacks during tea breaks are to die for.

passiveSkill.name: Popular Songstress
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Anna is present, grants all allied partners {placeholder} DMG Rate and {placeholder} DMG RES Rate.Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Deploy at least 5 partners of different classes.Activation Reward: When Anna is present, grants herself and allied partners deployed after Anna 10% DMG Rate and 10% DMG RES Rate."}

uniqueSkill.name: Starlight Promise
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Anna sings a song of praise. Restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder}  to all allies and restores {placeholder} Rage to herself."}

specialSkill.name: Sound of Nature
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Anna's smile is her best weapon. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, restoring {placeholder} Rage.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Encore
normalSkill.description: Anna whispers a spell. Restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the ally with the lowest HP.

templateData.lens4.skill: Anna sings a song of praise. Restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder}  to all allies and restores {placeholder} Rage to herself.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Anna is present, grants all allied partners {placeholder} DMG Rate and {placeholder} DMG RES Rate.Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Deploy at least 5 partners of different classes.Activation Reward: When Anna is present, grants herself and allied partners deployed after Anna 10% DMG Rate and 10% DMG RES Rate.
templateData.lens6.skill: Anna's smile is her best weapon. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, restoring {placeholder} Rage.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
